flawed_nl_solution:
Matt is 11 x 4 = <<11*4=44>>44 years old now.
In 2 years, Matt will be 44 + 2 = <<44+2=64>>64 years old.
In 2 years, Fem will be 11 + 2 = <<11+2=13>>13 years old.
So, the sum of their ages in two years is 64 + 13 = <<64+13=77>>77 years old.
#### 77

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 64. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
